name: Quench the Flame
flavorText: The flamedrinker armor you wear glows red with heat as it absorbs all the flames in your vicinity.
text: For the duration of the ritual, the flamedrinker armor you or an ally wears absorbs all natural flames within 20 squares of the armor, quenching them instantly. It glows red each time it absorbs a flame and grows hot over time, but this heat does not harm the armorâ€™s wearer.
